items.headline: I’m in my 50s, happily divorced, and fell in love with an old school friend. Do we marry?
items.summary_en: “I have a mortgage balance of $600,000 on a $1.7 million house.”

items.headline: L.A. Lakers coach JJ Redick lists his Brooklyn ‘trophy’ penthouse for $6.2 million
items.summary_en: Redick’s lavish New York penthouse has four bedrooms and 4.5 bathrooms and is perched atop a seven-story converted warehouse.

items.headline: Leonardo DiCaprio lowers the price of his Malibu beach house to $20 million

items.headline: U.S. stock futures rise as Senate advances deal to end government shutdown
items.summary_en: U.S. stock futures gained Sunday, despite coming off the worst week for tech stocks since April, as investors welcomed a tentative Senate deal that may soon end the government shutdown.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘He lives paycheck to paycheck’: My husband pays his bills late and sits at home playing on his computer. How do I fix it?
items.summary_en: “He seems to think ‘bill due’ dates are a suggestion. He has literally no savings.”

items.headline: Trump floats idea of $2,000 tariff dividend checks to most Americans
items.summary_en: President Donald Trump on Sunday floated the idea of payments of at least $2,000 to most Americans to show the benefits of his tariff policy.

items.headline: More than 2,500 flights were cancelled on Sunday. Business travelers are scrambling to deal with the air-traffic cutbacks.
items.summary_en: From flying privately to gassing up cars, different ways of getting from one destination to another are quickly being considered.

items.headline: I have $12K in credit-card debt due to health issues and a 30% pay cut. Is it finally time to take a loan from my 401(k)?

items.headline: ‘We can’t afford to buy a house’: My husband and I are building a house on my mother-in-law’s land. Are we asking for trouble?
items.summary_en: “A single-family home where we live costs $600,000 or more.”
